bibl.title: The Manuscript. Posidippus on Papyrus.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: STEPHENS, Susan

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, and the other poems of Posidippus on papyrus. - What we can deduce from the Milan roll.
STEPHENS Susan and Dirk OBBINK, The Manuscript. Posidippus on Papyrus.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 9-13.
